definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: Germany then declared martial law in these cities.
sentences.chinese: 德国这时就在这些城市宣布戒严令。

sentences.english: The country is under martial law and the airports are closed.
sentences.chinese: 洪都拉斯目前实施了戒严令，机场被关闭。

sentences.english: President clark has signed a decree today declaring martial law .
sentences.chinese: 克拉克总统今日签署一项法案，颁布戒严令。

definition: to impose martial law/to impose emergency measures
to lift restrictions (such as curfew or martial law)
restrictions on the publication of newspapers/press restrictions
posting on a bulletin board/notice/bulletin/to announce
a notice to reassure the public/advance notice (of an agenda)
decree to grant a special pardon
